column4: I just logged out of a guest account, computer locked up with just a black screen.  After a hard reboot, I no longer have use of most number keys. Only "5","6".  On the number pad however I have full 123456789.  Any ideas?
This is a huge problem because I can no longer login to my main account or root.
ahhh, when you reboot, before grub starts to boot, select the safe mode kernel?
